hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"The Prophet only performed the two rak'ah (units of prayer) after Asr because some wealth came to him which distracted him from the two rak'ah after Zuhr, so he prayed them after Asr, then he did not repeat that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: : What Has Been Related About Salat After Asr
